alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Isle of Wight, northeastern Southampton, southeastern York, east central Sussex and southeastern Surry Counties, the northeastern City of Suffolk, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 545 PM EDT... At 503 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Eustis to near Isle Of Wight to near Sedley. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Smithfield, Windsor, Wakefield, Surry, Hampton University, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Portsmouth, Suffolk, Isle Of Wight, Northampton, Ivor, Dendron, Rescue, Tabb, Elberon, Beaconsdale and Driver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex; York
